ply.translation[0].definitions[0].defini: if a ship, bus etc plies between two places or across a place, it does that journey regularly
ply.translation[0].definitions[0].exampl: Two ferries ply between Tripoli and Malta every day.
ply.translation[1].definitions[0].defini: a unit for measuring the thickness of thread, rope, plywood etc, based on the number of threads or layers that it has
ply.translation[2].definitions[0].exampl: 60 retailers were plying their products on the radio.
ply.translation[2].definitions[1].defini: to work at your job or business
ply.translation[2].definitions[1].exampl: two outdoor barbers plying their trade on the beach
ply.translation[2].definitions[2].defini: if a vehicle or boat plies between two places, it makes the journey regularly
ply.translation[2].definitions[2].exampl: ferries plying between Dover and Calais
The airline is not allowed to ply domestic routes.
